name: "Go fish.", Simon said. (GMTK Jam 2022)
description:
Praise be to the almighty dice gods! You are what they say you are and you do what they tell you to. Test your luck and skill in this fishy game of chance. The one richest in schmeckles shall be crowned "Almighty God Fish Emperor". Will it be you? Press Escape for the instructions

This is my submission to GMTK Jam 2022. Please rate it. Please. I'm so desperate. Feedback would be great, it would help me out a lot. Point out my weaknesses, complain about the game, really tear me apart mentally and emotionally. Please don't hesitate to really cut this game apart, as long as I receive constructive feedback.  Thank you!

Art Assets:
https://pixelfrog-assets.itch.io/pirate-bomb
https://spicylobster.itch.io/fish-world-pack

Tools:
LDTK and Aseprite

Please leave a comment, actual feedback helps me learn.
